thread.title: 2CELLOS Perform a Beautiful Game of Thrones Medley With London Symphony Orchestra
thread.title_full: 2CELLOS Perform a Beautiful Game of Thrones Medley With London Symphony Orchestra

author: Scott Beale
title: 2CELLOS Perform a Beautiful Game of Thrones Medley With London Symphony Orchestra

organizations.name: thrones medley with london symphony orchestra  luka sulic

text:
Luka Sulic and Stjepan Hauser of 2CELLOS perform a beautiful Game of Thrones Medley with the London Symphony Orchestra from their new album of film music, Score , which is now available for pre-order . The video was shot in Dubrovnik, Croatia , the location of Kings Landing from the HBO series.
We are thrilled to announce our new album SCORE – our versions of some of the most beautiful film music played with the London Symphony Orchestra! We are so excited! NEW MUSIC THIS FRIDAY!! 
A photo posted by 2CELLOS (@2cellosofficial) on Jan 11, 2017 at 4:43am PST
